question: 一生懸命
sourceMnemonic: You have only <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>life</kanji> so do everything with lots of <kanji>eager</kanji>ness (<ja>懸命</ja>). Do everything <vocabulary>with all one's might</vocabulary>. Go <vocabulary>all out</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Everything except the <ja>生</ja> uses the readings you learned with the kanji, and you learned this reading of <ja>生</ja> when you learned <ja>一生</ja>. You've really been going <vocabulary>all out</vocabulary> to learn these readings!
